dict.string: The renderings looks pretty convincing and this ia a nice project to be in the downtown core? A little more street connection to engage the context will definitly make it better. But still it looks a bit generic.
I agree. I hope it does not look like another glass cube with a tower on top at the end...The area has so much potential and why shouldn't Ottawa have a more progressive mixed-use community?
Not to comment on the form but yes, it does look very disengaged from the streets. Although the rendering suggests losts of options to connect to the context...hummm

The rendering looks pretty convincing and this is a nice project to be in the downtown core? A little more street connection to engage the context will definitly make it better. But still it looks a bit generic.
